keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.OIGA

Class SEM

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.OIGA.SEM

  • public class SEM
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements the SEM algorithm of the OIGA method, which evolves mono-attribute rules.

    Since:
    JDK 1.5

    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Written by Julián Luengo Martín 08/02/2007

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SEM()
      Default constructor.
      SEM(int pobSize, int numberRules, int attSel, InstanceSet IS)
      Parametrized constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void crossOver()
      It performs a one point crossover in the new poblation, using adjacent chromosomes as parents
      void elitism()
      Copy the survivorsPercent proportion of the old poblation into the bottom half of the new one
      void evaluate()
      Its evaluate the NEW poblation, using a metric which summarizes the train CR and test CR
      RuleSet getChromosome(int i)
      Gets the i-th chromosome
      double getCR()
      Gets the Classification Rate of this SEM
      void mutate()
      Applies mutation in the new poblation
      void onePointCrossover(int cr1, int cr2)
      One-point crossover
      void run()
      It runs the Single-attribute Evolution Module (SEM) algorithm to obtain a rule set of ONE attribute
      void selection()
      Applies a roulette wheel selection
      void setGAparams(double mutationProb, double crossoverRate, double survivorsPercent)
      Set the parameters for this SEM
      void setGenerationLimit(int iters)
      Set the generations limit
      void setIS(InstanceSet dataset)
      Sets the reference data set for this SEM
      void tournament_selection()
      Applies a tournament selection, with tournament size of 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • SEM

        public SEM()

        Default constructor. No memory allocated

      • SEM

        public SEM(int pobSize,
           int numberRules,
           int attSel,
           InstanceSet IS)
        Parametrized constructor
        Parameters:
        pobSize - number of chromosomes (rule sets)
        numberRules - number of rules of each chromosome
        attSel - attribute used to evolve in this SEM
        IS - the data set used for train the SEM

    • Method Detail

      • setIS

        public void setIS(InstanceSet dataset)
        Sets the reference data set for this SEM
        Parameters:
        dataset - new data set for training

      • setGenerationLimit

        public void setGenerationLimit(int iters)
        Set the generations limit
        Parameters:
        iters - maximum number of iterations of the SEM

      • setGAparams

        public void setGAparams(double mutationProb,
                        double crossoverRate,
                        double survivorsPercent)
        Set the parameters for this SEM
        Parameters:
        mutationProb - the mutation probability
        crossoverRate - the crossoverProbability between 2 parents
        survivorsPercent - the percent of parents that will be maintained from a generation to next one

      • getCR

        public double getCR()
        Gets the Classification Rate of this SEM
        Returns:
        retuns the Classification Rate of this SEM

        Returns:

        One-point crossover
        Parameters:
        cr1 - index of parent 1 in poblation
